thread.title: ‘The 7th Room’ is the world’s most luxurious tree house (7 Photos)
thread.title_full: ‘The 7th Room’ is the world’s most luxurious tree house (7 Photos)

author: Matt
title: ‘The 7th Room’ is the world’s most luxurious tree house (7 Photos)
text:
Welcome to the ‘The 7th Room’, the most luxurious treehouse you will ever see. 2 
Constructed by the architecture firm Snøhetta, the 600 square foot ‘wood cabin’ stands 33 feet above the ground and is situated in Northern Sweden, just outside the Arctic Circle. It consists of two bedrooms, a bathroom, a social lounge area, as well as an outdoor terrace with a netted base to provide the ultimate viewing platform for the world famous Northern Lights. 3 
The cabin, as well as six other of a smaller size, belongs to the company Treehotel, who aim to help you ‘forget about the time constraints of everyday life, enjoy the serenity, and rejuvenate in a sophisticated yet familiar environment.’ 4 
Being in the middle of nowhere is getting more and more attractive everyday.. 
Check out Treehotel’s website for more information.
